body.name: KEPSUUL Heavy Duty 2 Shelf Customizable Adjustable Tier Modular Short Metal Shelving and Multipurpose Storage Bookcase Room Divider for Garage, Kitchen, Bedroom 29.75" H – Black

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Best Home Fashion Store

features: MODERN and CLEAN APPEARANCE: Features Hidden tabs and holes for a cleaner appearance. Durable Powder-coated steel frame resists rust and scratches.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Designed without bolts & nuts, easily assemble in approximately 15 minutes. Hammer is included for convenience.

STURDY and DURABLE: New improved design increases sturdiness. Kepsuul is made in S. Korea with steel frame and shelves and doors made of E1 grade laminated MDF board. Maximum load capacity is 200 lbs per shelf.
MULTIPURPOSE ADJUSTABLE SHELVES: Adjust shelf height to fit your needs. Shelves can be used in a basket and flat styles. Add on additional units to create your own KEPSUUL to fit your space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exactly What You Need, Everytime! Each Kepsuul Modules contain 3 vertical posts that can be split up into 3 separate standing modules! This means you can split 1 module into multiple modules to fit your needs or a particular space. Adjustable Storage Shelf Ever been in that frustrating situation where you can't fit a tall or irregularly shaped item on your shelf? Fear Not! With Kepsuul, you can always adjust the storage shelf height when you need it to where you need it!

EASY ASSEMBLY! Enjoy the easy assembly process with no bolts or screws. All you need to do is to JUST INSERT the pieces together.Everything you need to build is in the box, including a reusable mallet! STURDY and QUALITY Material Maximum load capacity is 250 lbs per shelf.Heavy Duty Powder Coated frames are scratch-resistant. Wood grain detailed shelves and magnetic frame add a nice to your home. CUSTOMIZE Shelf Type Based on Usage You can switch the shelf type based on your needs! BASIC: Display and store items easily BASKET: Secure breakables and more!COMBO: Securely hold items with easy access. SLANTED: Keep track of your inventory.

Perfect for ANY ROOM As a fully customizable modular furniture system, you get to decide what you want it to be. Make it into an easy-to-build walk-in closet, handy garage storage, cozy reading nook, multi-functional entertainment center, versatile craft space, store fixture, or even a convention booth! CUSTOMIZE It Your Way Adjust shelves by simply inserting the beams where you need them to be! Easy and quick building process combined with FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE parts makes it possible for you to transform the Kepsuul system to your exact needs!Build and rebuild when you need it without hassle! TRANSFORM Your Shelf Various accessories options to transform your shelves! Hanger BarColorful PanelsColor/Wood Look Reversible Doors Mesh Board

1 SYSTEM that DOES IT ALL! WALK-IN CLOSET Adjust the height of your hanger bar and shelf to perfectly fit longer coats or dresses.Add a Kepsuul MESHBOARD to easily hang accessories like scarves, neckties, hats, and more. LAUNDRY ROOM Leave the bottom part of Kepsuul open to place heavy items like washer and dryer.Use Kepsuul as a folding table and basket-type shelf underneath to easily keep folded clothes or hampers. GARAGE Combine the desk function of the Kepsuul with the MESHBOARD add-on to create the ultimate DIY projects station.Store heavy and long items in the bottom, and adjust the height of the shelves for any irregularly shaped items. LIVING ROOM Combine two or more modules to create a perfect TV stand.Use BASKET type shelves to display blu-ray discs, LPs, and more.Adjust height of the shelves to display tall décor items like sculptures or vases.

Easy Tidy Organization Box Tulle Overlay Romantic Blackout Curtains 4 Shelf with 2 Doors Set 4 Shelf with 2 Panels Set Light Filtering Curtains Set Special Feature 3 Access Points Tulle and Blackout Layered Customizable Modular Furniture with Reversible Doors Customizable Modular Furniture with Color Panels Ruffled Border & Rod Pocket/Back Tab Colors White & More Biscuit & More Taupe & More White & More Reseda & More Customizable ✓ ✓ ✓ Base Materials Plastic Polyester Power-Coated Steel Power-Coated Steel Faux Linen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exasperating to assemble, but worth it
reviews.reviewText: I was so exasperated putting this together I finally asked my movers to do it for me. It still took them about an hour to get it assembled. After all the stress, I still ended up really liking this piece. It is a perfect tower to display my treasures and once assembled is quite sturdy. No tools, screws or hooks, just a small padded plastic hammer that the company provides. To be fair, take my advice....this is NOT a one person job. Things went much better when there were two people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars solid, nice for price
reviews.reviewText: We are using as a microwave and water bottle stand in our shop and its not bad, pretty sturdy for the price.
